item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Tuesday, October 1, 2024 at 2:15 PM UTC
item.description:
1. ESO telescope captures the most detailed infrared map of the Milky Way (125 points | 20 comments)
2. YC criticized for backing AI startup that simply cloned another AI startup (240 points | 164 comments)
3. Amazon UK pays corporation tax for first time since 2020 (36 points | 12 comments)
4. Boris Vallejo and the pixel art of the demoscene (371 points | 94 comments)
5. Mozilla's lapse in judgement causes clash with uBlock Origin developer (37 points | 23 comments)
6. Bop Spotter (2170 points | 352 comments)
7. Ask HN: How close are we to replace animal models with software? (13 points | 13 comments)
8. "Comedy is search" – theory on how jokes work (140 points | 91 comments)
9. What the Photographer Who's Taken Philosopher Portraits Thinks of Philosophers (24 points | 1 comment)
10. NewsCatcher News API (YC S22) Is Hiring ( | hide)
11. Sea robins use leg-like fins to taste, navigate seafloor, researchers discover (24 points | 1 comment)
12. Ask HN: Should you reply STOP to unwanted texts? (163 points | 189 comments)
13. Show HN: qrframe – generate beautiful qr codes with javascript code (311 points | 46 comments)
14. Essential node in global semiconductor supply chain hit by Hurricane Helene (154 points | 39 comments)
15. PyTorch Native Architecture Optimization: Torchao (135 points | 39 comments)
16. MusicBrainz: An open music encyclopedia (382 points | 84 comments)
17. Show HN: Facad – A colorful directory listing tool for the command line (124 points | 81 comments)
18. Pear AI founder: We made two big mistakes (135 points | 145 comments)
19. Vanishing Culture: Preserving Cookbooks (119 points | 78 comments)
20. Ask HN: What is the best way to learn Erlang? (47 points | 36 comments)
21. Show HN: Venator – Open-source threat detection (64 points | 1 comment)
22. Evolving GitHub Issues (3 points | discuss)
23. The Case of the Missing Increment (49 points | 14 comments)
24. Launch HN: Inkeep (YC W23) – Copilot for Support (think Cursor for help desks) (113 points | 56 comments)
25. Phrase matching in Marginalia Search (172 points | 21 comments)
26. California bans legacy admissions at private universities (497 points | 536 comments)
27. Ask HN: Any good essays/books/advice about software sales? (204 points | 77 comments)
28. Show HN: A macOS app to prevent sound quality degradation on AirPods (191 points | 264 comments)
29. BorgBackup 2.0 supports Rclone – over 70 cloud providers in addition to SSH (230 points | 74 comments)
30. Keep Track: 3D Satellite Toolkit (168 points | 36 comments)
